    iPTLine
    public class PTLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements iPTLine
    PTLine class implements interface iPTLine Used to represent lines in public transport
    Author:
    Vojtěch Čoupek (xcoupe01), Tadeáš Jůza (xjuzat00)
